TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MacAttribute extends ObjCRuntime.AvailabilityAttribute

Docs.summary: Attribute indicating when an API was first introduced on macOS.
Docs.remarks: This class is a shortcut to create an AvailabilityAttribute instance.
